aanduwa uuwa palath sabha mathiwaranaya ilakka kota uuwa palathe bhishanaya saha mardanaya pathuruwamin da, wiwidha bhanda janathawa athara bedaharimin da, rajya depola, mudal saha niladharin mathiwarana wyaparaya wenuwen pawichchi karamin da, mathiwarana nithi rithi amu amuwe ullanghanaya karana bawa penwa dun deshabandu karu jayasuriya mahatha pradhana eksath jathika paksha manthriwaru me thaththwaya wahama nawathwa nidahas saha sadharana mathiwaranayak pawathwimata awashya kriyamarga kadinamin gannayi illa sitiyaha.

ema panathata yatathwa aayathanaya abhiniyojanaya kirime hakiyawa janadhipathiwarayata thibenawa - nithignya shiral lakthilaka me pilibandawa bibisi sinhala sewaya janadhipathiwarayage sambandhikarana lekam nithignya shiral lakthilaka gen wimasimak kala awasthawe ohu kiya sitiye oonama aayathanayak oonama amathyanshayak yatathata pathkirimata janadhipathiwarayata nila washayen balaya thibena bawaya.

usas pela samathwa siti aya rakiya sandaha illum kala da (warthamanaye mithuru mithuriyan athara aya handunwanne kanthi namini) eewa kunu kudayata yaddi mahana mashimak niwasata genawith ahala pahala udawiyata andum masa di yahamin hari hamba kalaya.me wana wita kalayak mululle modu wi thibu premaye prathipalayak lesa yuddha hamudawe thurya wadaka kandayame kadawasam tharunayaku samanga aya wiwaha wi sitiyaya.
parlimenthuwe me balaya amathaka kara thibuna.

ranil wikramasinha wipaksha nayakawarayada uthure sadharana mathiwaranayak wenuwen dahadiya waguruwamin sitinu pene.ee wena kisiwakatawath nowa demala abhilashayan itu wana batahirayan sathutu wana aakaraye palanayak bihi karaganimath ee haraha eekiyabhawaya huyen janathawa samaga bandi sitina aanduwa keren janathawa iwath karaganimath yana eka alen kurullan dedeneku ba ganime aramunini.eda demala jathiwadaye nirmathruwarayan wu chelwanayagam wisin warak thaman demala janaya porondu deshaya wana demala eelama kara gena yannata dewiyan wisinthoragena athi bawa prakasha karamin ekala engalantha sabhawe kurunagala bishopwaraya wu lakshaman wikramasinha dewagathiwaraya demala janaya porondu deshaya kara genayana mosas waraya bawa prakasha kara thibe.
ee nisa mama yurenita sindu tikak karala dunna.
diga adi 120 ki.
nawathinna thiyena nohakiyawa nisama mama thawamath duwanawa.
meka diga wadiyi..
